addVehicle

protected void addVehicle(Vehicle v,
                          int lane)

removeVehicle

protected int removeVehicle(Vehicle v)
remove the vehicle from the current road. must acquire the synchronization lock in advance. the removed vehicle would be added into a removal queue, rather than deleted directly, in order to provide concurrent iterating.

参数：
v - the vehicle to be removed
返回：
the number of vehicles remaining on the road

performRemoval

public void performRemoval()
perform actual removal. remove the vehicles in the removal queue. must acquire concurrent visit lock first.

public void performInsertion()

public void flushQueue()

moveLine

private static void moveLine(Point start,
                             Point end,
                             double d)
move the line from start and point to their right by d. the resulting starting and destination point is stored in start and end, i.e., the original parameter would be modified. BE SURE TO CREATE A NEW ONE when necessary.

参数：
start - starting point of the line
end - ending point of the line
d - the distance to be moved

moveLine

public static void moveLine(Point start,
                            Point end,
                            Point m,
                            double d)

public Point getPositionOnRoad(double distance,
                               int lane)
get the coordinate (point) distance from the starting point of the lane-th lane of the current road.

参数：
distance -
lane -
返回：
the point of the corresponding position

getPositionOnRoad

public Point getPositionOnRoad(double distance,
                               int lane,
                               boolean moveLine)
get the coordinate (point) distance from the starting point of the lane-th lane of the current road.

参数：
distance -
lane -
moveLine - whether perform moveLine. false if only consider the central axis of the road
返回：
the point of the corresponding position

closestDistance

public double closestDistance(Vehicle p)
return the closest distance on the road from the current vehicle (in front of the vehicle)

参数：
p - the current vehicle
返回：
the closest distance from the other objects to p, or the distance to the next intersection if it is closer.
